modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod increases and decreases speed of walking and running on different terrains. Compatible with Alpha 18 game version.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod increases and decreases speed of walking and running on different terrains. For instance, walking on roads now provides a movement boost, while walking through snow and sand decreases movement speed. It does this both for zombies and players though.

Compatible with Alpha 18 game version, will need to check for new Terrain Types, sidewalks no longer exist.

**[Download](http://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/TerrainBasedMovementSpeed.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8777-lucs-modlet-collection-quality-bonuses-better-stamina-terrain-mv-spd-etc/).

**Credits:** [Luc](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/luc/)
